title: Beautiful bright unit with balcony available 9/1!
posting_body: Located in a prime West Los Angeles neighborhood, West Park Village is a premium apartment community with two heated pools, fitness center, and a professional on-site management team.
A variety of floor plans provide flexible options to suit your needs, while the convenient location keeps you close to the bustling lifestyle of West Los Angeles.
- Located 3 miles from Santa Monica College
- Balcony and patios in select apartments
- Two sparkling heated pools and spa
- Many options to pay rent including, credit card, on-line and ACH
- Gated parking (limited availability for Studio and Efficiency units – call to confirm)
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
